summary.para: A DownloadHandler subclass specialized for downloading images for use as Texture objects.
Returns the downloaded Texture, or null. (Read Only)
Constructor, allows TextureImporter.isReadable property to be set.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.Networking.DownloadHandlerTexture.GetContent(UnityEngine.Networking.UnityWebRequest)

summary.para: Returns the downloaded Texture, or null.

member.param: A finished UnityWebRequest object with DownloadHandlerTexture attached.

summary.para: Called by DownloadHandler.data. Returns a copy of the downloaded image data as raw bytes.

returns.para: A copy of the downloaded data.

summary.para: Helpers for downloading image files into Textures using UnityWebRequest.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.Networking.UnityWebRequestTexture.GetTexture(System.String)

summary.para: Create a UnityWebRequest intended to download an image via HTTP GET and create a Texture based on the retrieved data.

member.param: The URI of the image to download.
If true, the texture's raw data will not be accessible to script. This can conserve memory. Default: false.

returns.para: A UnityWebRequest properly configured to download an image and convert it to a Texture.

member.name: M:UnityEngine.Networking.UnityWebRequestTexture.GetTexture(System.String,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Create a UnityWebRequest intended to download an image via HTTP GET and create a Texture based on the retrieved data.

member.param: The URI of the image to download.
If true, the texture's raw data will not be accessible to script. This can conserve memory. Default: false.

returns.para: A UnityWebRequest properly configured to download an image and convert it to a Texture.
